properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 9:48AM MST until February 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
primarily from Essex to Marias Pass. Southwest winds gusting to
35 MPH causing blowing and drifting of snow, with reduced
visibilities on Highway 2.

* WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan
Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 5 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING
